name: PENNSYLVANIA SOCIETY OF ORAL & MAXILLOFACIAL SURGEONS, William W. Weiss, Jr., D.D.S. and Allan S. Shaw, D.D.S., Appellants, v. INSURANCE COMMISSIONER OF the COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Continental Casualty Company and National Fire Insurance Company of Hartford
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania Society of Oral & Maxillofacial Surgeons v. Insurance Commissioner

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: PENNSYLVANIA SOCIETY OF ORAL & MAXILLOFACIAL SURGEONS, William W. Weiss, Jr., D.D.S. and Allan S. Shaw, D.D.S., Appellants, v. INSURANCE COMMISSIONER OF the COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Continental Casualty Company and National Fire Insurance Company of Hartford.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Harvey Bartle, III, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Arthur Selikoff, M. Hannah Leavitt, Harrisburg, for Ins. Com’n.
Robert E.J. Curran, Media, for Continental Cas. Co. & Nat. Fire Ins. Co. of Hartford.
casebody.head_matter:
535 A.2d 1050
PENNSYLVANIA SOCIETY OF ORAL & MAXILLOFACIAL SURGEONS, William W. Weiss, Jr., D.D.S. and Allan S. Shaw, D.D.S., Appellants, v. INSURANCE COMMISSIONER OF the COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Continental Casualty Company and National Fire Insurance Company of Hartford.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 9, 1987.
Decided Jan. 19, 1988.
Harvey Bartle, III, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Arthur Selikoff, M. Hannah Leavitt, Harrisburg, for Ins. Com’n.
Robert E.J. Curran, Media, for Continental Cas. Co. & Nat. Fire Ins. Co. of Hartford.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
